wikipedia_page.main: Charles Augustus Hulbert (31 December 1804–March 1888) was an English clergyman.

response: In 1805 he married Anna, daughter of Thomas Wood, proprietor of the Shrewsbury Chronicle. His eldest son, Charles Augustus Hulbert (1804–1888), was also a writer, and instrumental in the restoration of Almondbury Church. Two other sons and a daughter predeceased him.
